goxlr.header: Control your GoXLR from Twitchat. Requires {LINK}.
goxlr.no_device: There is no GoXLR device detected by GoXLR-Utility
infos: Once your GoXLR connected you can control it from the triggers or execute actions when using some of its buttons.
For example you can allow your viewers to enable an FX preset from a channel point rewards, a chat command, a subscription, ...
Or you can show an OBS source when mute or !{'@'}#$?* button is pressed.

connect_form.title: Credentials
connect_form.ip_security: Due to web browsers security, if you set an IP other than "127.0.0.1" or "localhost" the connection must be secured. If you want to connect to a remote desktop you must use an https tunnel (like Ngrok). Come ask for help on {LINK} if you don't know how to do that. If your GoXLR is on this computer, set 127.0.0.1 as IP.
